name: DrumRoll
0:
”Alexa, open drum roll and do a drum roll”
”let's have a drum roll”
”play a drum roll”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: drum roll
des:
Get Alexa to play a drum roll on demand.

Great for family announcements, prepares the way for important household proclamations!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
